_sText:
!!I KNOW IT IS SHORT!!
about: your goal is to beat everyone else in a bhop race! only 4 spawnpoints, but noblock will help ya out when you need more! the winner gets an awp and a button to kill everyone. 


credits: incompetech.com for the background music
how to install: extract the content of this .rar to cstrike/maps folder :)

made by iffa
http://youtube.com/user/1337iffamies
